preparations.content: Place garlic, onions and oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sauté <b>3 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add beef and tomato pureé then sauté <b>5 min/120°C//speed <b>.

Add tomatoes, beef stock, 700 g water, marjoram, sweet paprika, hot paprika, caraway seeds, bay leaf, Tabasco, salt and pepper then cook <b>35 min/100°C//speed 1<b>. Meanwhile, mix flour and remaining 60 g water in a bowl until smooth.

Add flour mixture, red peppers and green peppers then cook <b>8 min/100°C//speed 1<b>. Remove bay leaf then transfer to serving bowls. Garnish with oregano (if using) and serve hot with crusty bread.
